body.name: Chefman Countertop Microwave Oven 0.9 Cu. Ft. Digital Stainless Steel Microwave 900 Watt with 6 Presets, Eco Mode, Mute Option, Memory Function, Child Safety Lock, Kitchen, Home, Dorm Essentials
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 16 mins
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 7 hrs 16 mins
features: PRE-PROGRAMMED SETTINGS: 6 presets for popcorn, potato, pizza, veggies, beverages, and leftovers take the guesswork out of perfectly cooked food.
LOW TO HIGH HEAT: 900 watts with 10 power levels offer better heating, defrosting, cooking, and more all in one compact microwave oven.
SAVE YOUR FAVORITE SETTINGS: Memory function saves frequently used settings to quickly start your cooking.
MULTIPHASE COOKING: Use 2 different cooking cycles for 1 meal. Simply program power levels and times and then press start.
COOK QUIETER: Mute option silences beeps and alarms for quieter cooking.
SAVE ENERGY: Eco mode reduces energy use by shutting off the digital display when not in use.
QUICK START 30 SECONDS: The +30 button instantly starts heat for 30 seconds and may be pressed multiple times.
SAFER HEAT: Childproof lock mode prevents the microwave from being started. Hold the STOP/CANCEL button for 3 seconds to turn on and off.
RESOURCES: UL approved with advanced safety technology for long-lasting durability and a 1-year assurance provided by Chefman. 900W/120V-RJ55-SS-9
body.description: The Chefman Classic Compact Microwave offers high-power cooking in 0.9 cubic feet. The 6 food presets, +30 seconds button, multiphase cooking, and memory function make microwaving faster and more convenient than ever. Save on energy use with eco mode, cook quieter with the mute option, or protect little ones with the childproof safety lock option. Purchase includes a 1-year assurance from Chefman. For information on how to use your product, scroll down for a PDF User Guide. 900 Watts/120 Volts–RJ55-SS-9 • 0.9 cubic feet • 6 cooking presets • 10 power levels • Memory function • Multiphase cooking • +30 seconds button • Mute option • Eco mode • Childproof safety lock

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best microwave we've owned!
reviews.reviewText: Finally, someone produced a microwave that does everything accurately and easily! It's intuitive to use, and soooo quiet, that sometimes I don't realize it's on! Cooks and defrosts evenly, better than more expensive units we've owned. It's smaller, but easily holds a dinner plate or casserole for reheating. Even my husband, who doesn't like anything that requires him to be an engineer to use, loves it! Highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little microwave!
reviews.reviewText: When this microwave arrived, my husband took one look and said, “It’s pretty small.” And he’s right. It is, but I’m not warming up elephants. It fits a dinner plate perfectly, and it heats very quickly and evenly. It’s not a countertop hog. Also, it’s quiet! The microwave we replaced sounded like jets were warming up in the kitchen. This one has a quiet hum you can barely hear from the next room. So far, it’s perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought This based on the reviews and I’m pleased. It’s nice looking and easy to use and i love how it has a 30 second button for my dogs food. It’s quiet and easy to use and i hope It lasts 18 years like my last one did. I reco This definitely

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It does the job
reviews.reviewText: It heats quickly and well. It is small, but that is what I wanted. The only thing I don't like is it is noisy when running, and especially noisy when you open and close the door. It has a tinny sound. I would rather pay a little more and have a better quality product. I had one, but it was too big for what I use it for so I decided to buy this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but nice
reviews.reviewText: The microwave is small like for a dorm room but it works well I like the feature whatever number you push that how long it goes. For example, if I need 5 mins I can push 5 and not have to put in 500 . Really nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little microwave:)
reviews.reviewText: I like everything about this microwave from low noise, to ease of use with the keypad, to it cooking everything I needed. I don't make family sized meals, so this is perfect for what I need. Very easy to keep clean. I wipe it out after each use. I haven't had it long but would highly recommend it for simple use, so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Far So Good!
reviews.reviewText: Still learning how to use all the features, but it’s working very well. I’d like to warn others who go by the reviews, for some reason they have lumped different models of these Chefman Microwaves into the same category, the 0.7, along with the 1.0 and the model that uses a ‘MicroCrisp’ feature as well ( a 1.0). The 0.9 seems to have the best reviews but unless you are really paying attention it will seem as though they all apply to the 0.9. This can be quite misleading and confusing. Anyhow, hoping this model, the 0.9 will work for a long time to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the features
reviews.reviewText: This is the first microwave I can truly say I love. The clock light isn't so bright it lights up the room and the mute allows you to not have to hear the beeps. It also has a childproof lock. The small profile is great for small spaces or countertops where you don't have a lot of room. It's a nice looking microwave and I'm glad I chose this one. I had a terrible experience with the Farberware microwave and their customer service so I'm hoping this one lasts longer
